title: Juniper Networks security advisory (AV25-202)
description: On April 9, 2025, Juniper Networks published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Junos OS on EX and QFX5k Series   multiple versions
Junos OS on MX Series   multiple versions
Juno OS on SRX Series   multiple versions
Junos Space Security Director   versions prior to 24.1R3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
